subject: Home & DIY
title: Why Furniture Subscription Models Are Rising
description: A micro-lesson that makes Why Furniture Subscription Models Are Rising usable.

hook.text: You can now rent a sofa monthly like a Netflix subscription. When you move or get bored, swap it for a different one.

buildup.text: Companies like Feather and Fernish let urban renters furnish apartments without buying, storing, or moving heavy pieces.

discovery.text: For people who move every 2-3 years, renting furniture can cost less than buying cheap pieces and abandoning them.

twist.text: Returned pieces are refurbished and re-rented up to five times, slashing waste versus the buy-and-trash cycle.

climax.text: The model mirrors how millennials already consume music, cars, and softwareâ€”access over ownership.
